title: Workplace harassment at a tech firm
content: I've been dealing with subtle comments about my background for months. I finally decided to use ShadowTrial, and it helped me realize I have enough evidence for a formal report. Writing it down privately first was the biggest relief.

title: Unfair termination after reporting an incident
content: Reporting was the hardest thing I've ever done. If you're currently in the middle of it, just know you aren't alone. Keep your documentation safe and external to company systems.

title: Need advice on choosing an advisor
content: Looking for recommendations for advisors who specialize in environmental harassment. The Legal Flow here was helpful, but I want to talk to a real person next week.
